content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Distribution System at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -83.5) connected to the mining drill
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -83.5) for coal collection
- Transport Belt starting at position (42.5, -83.5) for coal distribution
- Additional Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -80.5) moving coal to another Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) supplied with iron ore and coal
- Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0) supplied with iron ore and coal

### Belt Group for Coal Transport
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with inputs from position (41.5, -83.5) to (43.5, -83.5) and outputs from position (44.5, -83.5) to (46.5, -83.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the source entity has items available for the inserter to pick up. Check the supply chain and inventory of the source entity to avoid idle inserters.
